branchCategory.name: NC(D)MW, Stainless Steel Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Standard double acting double rod version of our NCM stainless steel cylinders. A wear ring extends the seal life and a bronze rod bushing is standard on all bore sizes. The NCM is auto-switch capable without any change in cylinder dimension. Bore sizes range from 3/4" to 2" and standard strokes from 1/2" to 12".</p>
